===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# describes a great distance; far off
#: [[他]][[從]]'''十萬八千里'''[[的]][[地方]][[回來]][[了]]
#: ''He returned from a '''far off''' land.''
# describes a huge difference between two things; miles apart
#: [[想像]][[真]][[的]][[會]][[離]][[事實]]'''十萬八千里'''[[的]]！
#: ''What one imagines can truly be '''miles apart''' from the facts!''
